expected_behavior: Agent reviews the single file inline at all 3 levels (Correctness, Design, Efficiency)
If no P0/P1 or S0 findings exist, agent states this explicitly
Agent does not inflate findings or invent issues to fill a report
Agent acknowledges well-engineered patterns and clean code as strengths
A short report with few or no findings is presented as a positive outcome, not a failure
Agent does not skip research validation even for a clean file
Agent calibrates severity by project type (prototype vs production vs library)
